title: Did Hillary Clinton raise for the sound of Iraq's war?
subtitle: During the appearance of MSNBC in the City Hall in March 2016, Hillary Clinton discussed her vote in the Iraq War, but did not suggest that her voice was part of a political bribe.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hillary Clinton admitted that her vote in the Iraq War was obtained in exchange for the money provided by the Bush administration to help rebuild New York City after the September 11 attacks.
